description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a login screen within a healthcare management application's frontend. It includes form inputs for email and password, validation logic, and interaction with a provider-based authentication state management.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the login screen with email and password input fields.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the login form's state, input controllers, form validation, and submission logic.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the text editing controllers when the widget is removed from the widget tree.

methods.name: _onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission by validating inputs, calling the login method from auth provider, and showing error messages if login fails.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the login screen UI with input fields, sign-in button, and responsiveness adjustments.
